1.title: Let the Badness Begin

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Three of the baddest Bad Girls from Sin City move into a swanky Hollywood Hills mansion and battle for the affection and attention of 12 sexy, single studs. A game changing twist shakes things up early while the girls kiss and grope their way into the guys' hearts.

2.title: Sex, Lies and Condiments

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The guys drive the girls crazy when the sexual tension is ramped up after an arousing visit from a sex therapist. Taylor and Joey stir up major drama in the house with a rumor about a rival competitor and cause a major brawl between the boys.

3.title: Step Up and Strip Down

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Shane and Taylor's rivalry for one of the Bad Girls comes to a head on a sexy strip club date. The Bad Girls showcase their best steps for famous choreographer Lil' C.

4.title: Hollywood Heartbreak

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: The boys and girls turn up the heat and show off some skin at a sexy, beachfront challenge. Amy starts making some serious moves on one of Dani's favorite guys and causes tears and tantrums.

5.title: Up in the Fight Club

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The boys are in the hot seat with a challenge that airs their dirtiest laundry. Trouble begins to brew with Camilla after a night at the club. Who will end up bruised and bloodied?

6.title: Ex Marks the Spot

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The girls are shaken to the core when the guys' ex-girlfriends come to the Love Games house. Lies threaten to ruin Camilla's beautiful island date.

7.title: For Love Games or Money

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Money can't buy you love, but it can in the Love Games house in a challenge where the guys spend top dollar to show their affection. In wine country, Dani and Camilla vie for the attention of one of the men.

8.title: Three Girls Enter One Girl Leaves

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The Bad Girls are shocked when three of their most hated enemies from Las Vegas come to the house for an intense dare challenge. The Love Game will be over for one eliminated Bad Girl, but that means things are just heating up for the other two girls.

9.title: ... And in the End

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: A twist shakes up the season finale as the remaining men vote on which Bad Girl wins the game, leaving only one to choose her man of choice.

1.title: Game On!

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Three former Bad Girls and 15 hot guys move into a swanky mansion looking for love. But when the games start, there is no stopping them. Let the backstabbing begin!

2.title: Punch Drunk Love

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Fresh off of losing some serious ground in the game, a scorned Natalie takes matters into her own hands - and those hands turn into fists.

3.title: Whatever It Takes

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Amber begins to seriously play the field in an attempt to find guys she can count on to help her win the competition. However, not everyone is playing straight with her.

4.title: And in This Corner...

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Natalie uses some fancy footwork to gain the upper hand, but all the power goes to her head when she drops a bomb on an unsuspecting guy and causes World War III in the house.

5.title: Guess Who's Coming to Love Games

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Surprise visitors to the Love Games house are a welcomed distraction. However, too much jealousy sparks some serious in-fighting between some of the guys.

6.title: Lewd, Prude & Otherwise

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Amber's teasing causes the guys to question her intentions as she risks losing her already shaky position in the game.

7.title: And Then There Were Two

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The allegiance between the girls and their stable of guys is put to the ultimate test with a series of ever increasingly outrageous dares; one Bad Girl will go home for good.

8.title: Last Bad Girl Standing

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The Love Game reaches new heights and tables are turned when the guys decide which Bad Girl will survive the final elimination.

1.title: Let the Bad Begin

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Three former Bad Girls meet 13 eligible guys looking for love. Judi lashes out when a drink is spilled on her while tension between frenemies Kori and Sydney comes to blows.

2.title: Boys and Battle Raps

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The girls showcase their rap skills for guest judge Too Short. Judi works her voodoo on one of Sydney's guys, causing drama to erupt and alliances to shift in the house.

3.title: Rock the Boat

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: The Bad Girls party on a Tiki boat and try to lure guys to their team. Pasquale rubs everyone the wrong way, and Tanisha lays down the law in the elimination room.

4.title: Heartbeats and Heartache

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Tempers explode when Sydney and Kori team up against Judi. Sydney's obsession with John starts to affect her game, and the girls play dirty to win over the guys' hearts.

5.title: Ex's and Oh's

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Women from the guys' past make surprise appearance and shake up the game. Sydney bristles at the exes while Kori uses them to dig up some dirty laundry.

6.title: Diamonds Are a Bad Girl's Best Friend

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Kori learns how much she's worth when the guys buy jewelry for the girls. Judi's insecurities get the best of her and John continues to play mind games with Sydney.

7.title: Players Will Play

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The Bad Girls are put through a series of intense dares, and ones girl's Love Game comes to an end. Fan favorite Natalie Nunn stops by and rattles the girls' nerves.

8.title: Happily Ever After

episode of.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: In the season finale, the guys send one Bad Girl packing. Later, the winning Love Games couple is revealed when the last girl standing chooses her man.

imdb.title: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too
akas: Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too (United States)
plot: A spin off series , that has three alumni bad girls from former seasons of The Bad Girls Club, competing in love games with thirteen eligible bachelors to find their perfect match and prove they are the baddest of the bunch.::Anonymous
